description.narrative: The project development objective is to increase agriculture productivity and access to community assets in remote rural areas by improving access to markets, irrigation, agricultural technologies, and community infrastructure.

title.narrative: Productivity of crops increased by at least 20 percent in targeted irrigation systems - Maize (Tons per hectare)
Marketed value of agricultural production increased by 20 percent in target area (Million BTN)
Productivity of crops increased by at least 20 percent in targeted irrigation systems - Paddy (Tons per hectare)
Share of beneficiaries with access to critical community infrastructure increased by 20 percent in target area - Sanitation
Share of beneficiaries with access to critical community infrastructure increased by 20 percent in target area- Improved source ofdrinking water

At least 5 best practice documents published and disseminated.
Area provided with irrigation and drainage services - New (ha)
At least 60 percent of targeted crop area rehabilitated and is productive (Cardamom)
At least 50 project chiogs with improved access to marketing and community infrastructure

Area provided with irrigation and drainage services (ha)

Clients who have adopted an improved agr. technology promoted by the project
